ygData.subject: Re: Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: *Have any of you done the message to Freeport yet.  I talked with one of *the Guild Masters in Neriak and he gave me a quest to talk to a spy in *Freeport.  I
ygData.messageBody:
*Have any of you done the message to Freeport yet. I talked with one of
*the Guild Masters in Neriak and he gave me a quest to talk to a spy in
*Freeport. I have been Freeport and even in the guild....and I
*can't seem
*to find the guy I'm looking for...maybe I have the wrong name
*written down
*or something....Anyone else ever do this quest?

I don't recall the details offhand but if it's the one to give to Opal, she
is out after dark, I believe. Time of day makes a difference as to where
the NPC's are.
